ygData.subject: Re: Trivial Levels
ygData.msgSnippet: ACK. Hon dont make files make scalers till 40. Thay are 2 diff items. Files bring you to about 20. So you just miss understood who ever you talked too. You get
ygData.messageBody:
ACK. Hon dont make files make scalers till 40. Thay are 2 diff items. Files
bring you to about 20. So you just miss understood who ever you talked too.
You get a file and a large lid for each one you make. Then goto skewers
till 115. Then armour. As far as studds i think thay area easy at 40 and
bonings at around 60. Dont do lanturns thay are too exspensive. You may fail
more with skewers but thay are cheeperer. As far as studd selling prices
thay cost about 6 gp a shot to try to make one depending on your chr and
natority level. Usuale sell them for a min of a plat. In truth I wouldnt
bother making these unless someone requests them. Just keep making scalers
then skewers till about 115. You can make armour about 110 with some good
luck. I made the one sheet things about half the time at this level. It cost
me about 100 plat to get too 110 but i have a high chr and was amiable to
the vendors.

if you have any other questions let me know
hon

Sylvia

Subject: [EQ_SMITHS] Trivial Levels


>From: Robert Tortajada <bobt@...>
>
>Someone told me to make scalars (files) from skill level 20 to 40. So I ran
and
>bout all the file molds I could carry only to find that they were trivial
to me. I
>had to sell all the molds back to the NPC and make studs. This brings up
the
>question, is there a list of objects and their trivial level? Also, what is
the
>best thing to make at 23? I think my choices are:
>
>Skewers
>studs
>lanterns
>
>Any suggestions?
>
>I would think that studs might be good if they can be sold to players, but
I would
>have no idea what studs would sell for.
>
>Cerivolk - karana
>
>>The EQ BlackSmithy Discussion Group
